item.description: Enjoy the fall foliage with a trail ride at Crowley’s Stables in Agawam, Massachusetts. No experience is required as they have a variety of horses and all rides are led by a guide. Rides last about 50 minutes and cost $30 each. We’ll meet at Gloria’s in Windsor for car-pooling at 1:00 PM or if you want to meet us directly at the stables, plan on about 1:30. Please RSVP early, as if we have a group of 8 or more, we need to make a reservation.
item.name: Horseback Riding
